Package fr.mathieubour.minesweeper.client.panels

Class VotePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • fr.mathieubour.minesweeper.client.panels.VotePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    class VotePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Display the user profile and allow him to: 1. Change his color; 2. vote for the next game difficulty.
